sentences.en: Bind the edge of the rug so that it won't ravel.
sentences.cn: 把地毯边镶好以免绽线.

sentences.en: Can you ravel out this piece of string? It's all in knots.
sentences.cn: 你能解开这根绳子 吗 ?上面满是结.

sentences.en: Don't let the cat ravel that ball of wool up.
sentences.cn: 别让那只猫把毛线弄乱了.

sentences.en: Don't ravel out the rope's end.
He tried to ravel all this matter out.
sentences.cn: 他试图把这件事弄个水落石出.

sentences.en: I've got to ravel this matter out.
sentences.cn: 我非把这件事弄清楚不可.

sentences.en: Knowing your deepest ravel it's gonna appears your eye, you go!
sentences.cn: 知道您最深切的拉威尔的单曲似乎你的眼睛, 你去!

sentences.en: Our company will do our best to ravel out your concerns.
sentences.cn: 本公司将尽一切努力为您解决后顾之忧.

sentences.en: Our temporary difficulties will ravel out.
sentences.cn: 我们的暂时困难将很快得到解决.

sentences.en: Our temporary difficulties will soon ravel out.
sentences.cn: 我们的暂时困难将很快得到解决。

sentences.en: Ravel a bit of the leftover cloth to mend the tear in your dress.
sentences.cn: 拆开一点剩布的线,缝补你的衣服上的撕裂处.

sentences.en: The difficulty will soon ravel out.
sentences.cn: 困难很快就会得到解决.

sentences.en: The floor was littered with ravel ( l ) ings.
We have to ravel the matter out.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把事情弄个水落石出.

sentences.en: You mean Debussy, Ravel , and those composers?
sentences.cn: 你是指像德彪西 、 瑞佛尔等作曲家的音乐 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 使纠缠， 纠结； 拆开， 拆散
